title: Emerald Polki Drop Earrings: A Timeless Elegance
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features a central oval-cut Emerald of exceptional green hue. Surrounded by brilliant-cut Polki diamonds
features: This earring is designed in a contemporary manner with two square-shaped Polki Diamond settings, each is followed up with a circle of smaller diamonds and a oval of Emerald in the middle. It features a minimalistic design that still emanates the royalty. The exquisite gold work is handcrafted.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a sophisticated statement. Suitable for modern events and celebratory occasions.
description: A perfect blend of traditional design and contemporary style. The striking emerald and diamond combination provides a rich and luxurious look. The high-quality gold and precise craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty.
